animeTitle: Shinran Shounin to Ousha-jou no Higeki
animeDescription: An spinoff of Sekai no Hikari: Shinran Shounin. It covers the life of Shinran Shounin and his involvement to develop the Mahayana Buddism branch.(Source: Wikipedia)
animeRelated: ['Side story: Sekai no Hikari: Shinran Shounin', 'Parent story: Butten Monogatari']
